definition: polyvinyl chloride fiber/PRC brand name for PVC fiber

sentences.english: Vinyl chloride-acrylonitrile copolymer fiber is an important raw material for producing fire-retardant fabric in China.
sentences.chinese: 腈氯綸纖維是我國生產阻燃織物的主要纖維品種。

sentences.english: This coat is made of PVC.
sentences.chinese: 這外衣是氯綸織物制的。

sentences.english: This beautiful coat is made of PVC.
sentences.chinese: 這件漂亮的外衣是氯綸織物制的。
